Title: Designates the Saratoga county supreme court law library as the "Thomas D. Nolan Jr. Law Library at Ballston Spa"
Summary: Designates the Saratoga county supreme court law library as the "Thomas D. Nolan Jr. Law Library at Ballston Spa".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to designating the Saratoga county supreme court law library as the "Thomas D. Nolan Jr. Law Library at Ballston Spa"
